alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 9:53AM EST until December 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Wind chills as cold as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Wyoming and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Monday. Lake effect snow will move back south into the area overnight through Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
